name: Blue Warcook
description:
Hello, This is a game made from scratch using Python and the PyGame framework.

This is just a simple shooter where you try to survive as long as you can while eliminating enemies with a scaling difficulty where enemies spawn much faster over a period of time.

This is the first game I made with PyGame by the way hehe...

Controls:

  • Any Mouse Button - Fire
  • A key - To move to the left
  • D key - to move to the right
  • Space bar - To jump
  • Enter - To start the game

Background music from: Junhani Junkala
